title.rendered: Valentines Day Special! A Library Of Timeless Love Quotes

content.rendered:
Valentine’s day is around the corner, and it’s that time of the year when we make our favorite ones feel extra special. So if you’re looking for the perfect love quotes to add to your handmade card or some non-cheesy captions for Instagram – then our collection will come in handy!

Love quotes from your favorite novels

Do you often find yourself rummaging through your brain to find the right words to express your love? In times like these, I delve into quotes from my favorite novels. I use them as captions for Instagram or just send them as texts to my favorite person!

“I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.” – John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

“You should be kissed and often, and by someone who knows how.” – Gone With The Wind by Margaret Mitchell

“I’ve never had a moment’s doubt. I love you. I believe in you completely. You are my dearest one. My reason for life.” – Atonement by Ian McEwan

“He stepped down, trying not to look long at her, as if she were the sun, yet he saw her, like the sun, even without looking.” – Anna Karenina by Leo Tolstoy

We are asleep until we fall in love!” – War and Peace by Leo Tolstoy

“I wish I knew how to quit you.” – BrokeBack Mountain by Annie Proulx

“In vain I have struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.” – Pride And Prejudice by Jane Austen

“There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.” – Sarah Dessen, The Truth About Forever

“Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.” – Robert A. Heinlein, Stranger in a Strange Land

Motivational Quotes From ‘Eat Pray Love’ That Teach Us About Life

Love Quotes From Your Favourite Rom-Coms

Some of these quotes make awesome opening lines for a love letter and even captions for Instagram.

“When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.” – When Harry Met Sally

“I am here and I am looking at her. And she is so beautiful. I can see it. This one moment when you know you’re not a sad story. You are alive, and you stand up and see the lights on the buildings and everything that makes you wonder. – The Perks of Being a Wallflower

“Thank you, I love you. I knew it the minute I met you. I’m sorry it took so long for me to catch up.” – Silver Linings Playbook

“I think I’d miss you even if we’d never met.” – The Wedding Date

“You make me happy. Even when you’re awful, I would rather be with you, even the you that you seem to think is diminished, than with anyone else in the world.” – Me Before You

“Here’s the deal. I love you. I know I do, because I’ve never been so scared in my entire life, and I once shared an elevator with Saddam Hussein. Just me and Saddam, and this is way scarier. I love you.” – Long Shot

30 Beautiful Quotes & Affirmations On Self Love To Start Your Day Right

Non-cheesy captions for Instagram & love quotes

This collection goes out to all the fun couples who love quirky relationship quotes as compared to the queasy cheesy love quotes.

“You’re kind of, sort of stuck with me.”

“I’d take you to the movies but they don’t let snacks inside.” (this is one of my favorite captions for Instagram! So cute!)

“Roses are red, let’s snuggle in bed.”

“To the moon and back.”

“Orange you glad you found me?”

“Thanks for putting up with me.”

“The lighting was good, so we took a selfie.”

“Find someone who wants to leave the party at the same time as you.”

“My whole heart and then some.”

“You are, hands down, my favorite person.”

“How’d I get so lucky?”

“The one where they fall in love.”

“One look at you, and the butterflies in my tummy start fluttering.”

“With my fav person, doing my fav thing, wearing my fav jacket and chilling in my fav place.”

Help! I Am In Love With My Roommate!

We hope you enjoyed our collection of famous love quotes and creative captions for Instagram. See you next time * waves *

excerpt.rendered: Valentine’s day is around the corner, and it’s that time of the year when we make our favorite ones feel extra special. So if you’re looking for the perfect love…

But, perhaps, the greatest gift she's blessed us with is Galentine's Day! Who says you only have to celebrate romantic love? We're all set to celebrate Feb 13th…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 30 Inspiring Quotes & Affirmations On Self Love
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Self love is the act of genuinely loving who you are without reservation. When you achieve it, you feel loved unconditionally, and you don't need the approval of others. More often said than done, self love is a term you're bound to encounter on social media. Then why is it…
